description: This file defines an authentication context and provider component for a React application. It manages user authentication state by fetching current user info from a backend endpoint and provides hooks for other components to access authentication status and user details.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: A React component that provides authentication context to its children by fetching user info from the backend.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: A React hook that provides access to authentication state and user info from the context.
